name: CanadianHoliday
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: canadian holiday
des:
In Canada, each state has regional holidays in addition to national holidays.
Selecting a state and saying a date,  the skill answers regional holiday along with national holiday.
When launch or reset, no state setting and return national holidays only.

Select a state(example): select Quebec
Say a date(example): January 1st, Today
Reset(remove state setting): reset
